releaseNotes: v1.8.6.0 (2026-02-19): Stability and authentication hardening release: corrected commStatus state handling during auth failures and rate limits, eliminated recursive reinitialize/login storms, implemented proper 429 backoff behavior, fixed WebSocket initialization sequencing and header handling, resolved Hubitat GString/connect signature issues, improved greenfield initialization behavior, refined logging controls and auto-disable routines, and completed additional structural cleanup for reliability.
